newsitem.title: USA: Cisco, Interlink in strategic pact.
newsitem.headline: Cisco, Interlink in strategic pact.

text.p: Interlink Computer Sciences Inc said Friday it has formed a strategic alliance with Cisco Systems Inc to develop and market a software suite to extend multiprotocol networking for MVS mainframes.
As part of the agreement, Cisco has made an equity investment in Interlink of 622,000 newly issued shares, equal to about nine percent of Interlink's 7,011,100 shares outstanding, Interlink said.
Interlink said Cisco has also purchased product licenses for its TCPaccess.

"Interlink is very excited to join Cisco and their partners in providing the most comprehensive network operating environment for users from the desktop to the mainframe," the company said in a release.
Interlink supplies high-performance solutions for enterprise networked systems management to enable customers to import, access and manage data across distributed client/server environments.
Cisco supplies internetworking solutions for corporate intranets and the global Internet.
